theGodHunters:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theGodHunters:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theGodHunters:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theGodHunters:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theGodHunters:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theGodHunters:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theGodHunters:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theGodHunters:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theGodHunters:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theGodHunters:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theGodHunters:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theGodHunters:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theGodHunters:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theGodHunters:LW_Abaddon.NAME: Abaddon
theGodHunters:LW_Abaddon.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage and drain Strength. NL Drain Dexterity if the opponent is casting a non-block skill.

theGodHunters:LW_Atlas.NAME: Atlas Blade
theGodHunters:LW_Atlas.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented. NL Hit the opponent with !D! Ink damage.

theGodHunters:AtlasInkSlash.NAME: Ink Slash
theGodHunters:AtlasInkSlash.DESCRIPTION: Create an Ink Orb that blocks or deals damage with other Atlas Blade cards.

theGodHunters:AtroposSever.NAME: Severed Source
theGodHunters:AtroposSever.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 1 Mana_Burn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 1 Mana_Burn.
Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal full Manablaze damage to your target and remove Manablaze.

theGodHunters:LW_Astra.NAME: The Astras
theGodHunters:LW_Astra.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented NL Summon the legendary Astras and gain their corresponding cards.

theGodHunters:AstraCard1.NAME: Brahmaastra
theGodHunters:AstraCard1.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - All enemies lose !D! HP. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable

theGodHunters:LW_Cerberus.NAME: Cerberus
theGodHunters:LW_Cerberus.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented NL Equip the Weapon Master's first sword and gain its corresponding cards.

theGodHunters:CerberusDrawSlash.NAME: Draw Slash
theGodHunters:CerberusDrawSlash.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus !M! bonus damage for every card you discard.

theGodHunters:CerberusSlash.NAME: Slash
theGodHunters:CerberusSlash.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus 2 bonus damage for every buff an enemy has.

theGodHunters:LW_Chronos.NAME: Chronophage
theGodHunters:LW_Chronos.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented NL Summon the Chronophage from across space and time and gain its corresponding cards.

theGodHunters:BreakerFenrir.NAME: Fenrir
theGodHunters:BreakerFenrir.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented NL Equip the evolving Fenrir and gain its corresponding cards.

theGodHunters:FenrirLacerate.NAME: Lacerate
theGodHunters:FenrirLacerate.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take 2 damage to deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. NL Evolve - Hit enemies with 3+ Lacerate.
theGodHunters:FenrirLacerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take 3 damage and deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. Deal 33% bonus damage to enemies with Lacerate. NL Evolve - Hit enemies with 3+ Lacerate.

theGodHunters:FenrirShieldEater.NAME: Shield Eater
theGodHunters:FenrirShieldEater.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage to deal !D! damage. NL Evolve - Destroy enemy Block.
theGodHunters:FenrirShieldEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage and deal !D! damage. Enemies lose health equal to 25% blocked damage. NL Evolve - Destroy enemy Block.

theGodHunters:FenrirIgnite.NAME: Ignite
theGodHunters:FenrirIgnite.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take 2 damage to gain Block equal to triple the number of Fenrir upgrades (including from this use). NL Evolve - All enemies intend to attack you.
theGodHunters:FenrirIgnite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take 3 damage to gain Block equal to 4 times the number of Fenrir upgrades (including from this use). NL Evolve - All enemies intend to attack.

theGodHunters:FenrirViciousSwing.NAME: Vicious Swing
theGodHunters:FenrirViciousSwing.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take 2 damage to deal !D! damage. NL Evolve - Play without holding other cards.
theGodHunters:FenrirViciousSwing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take 3 damage to deal !D! damage. Vicious. NL Evolve - Play without holding other cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal 5% bonus damage for every card you discarded this turn.

theGodHunters:FenrirUnrestrainedViolence.NAME: Unrestrained Violence
theGodHunters:FenrirUnrestrainedViolence.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take 3 damage to deal !D! damage to all enemies, one after another. NL Evolve - Kill an opponent.
theGodHunters:FenrirUnrestrainedViolence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take 3 damage to deal !D! damage to all enemies, one after another. Overkill. NL Evolve - Kill an opponent.

theGodHunters:LeviathanCrush.NAME: Crush
theGodHunters:LeviathanCrush.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Armor_Break NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.
theGodHunters:LeviathanCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Armor_Break, Crush NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.

theGodHunters:LW_Revenant.NAME: [#bf3a3b]Revenant [#bf3a3b]Cleaver
theGodHunters:LW_Revenant.DESCRIPTION: not_implemented - Equip the Revenant Cleaver and its corresponding cards.

theGodHunters:RevenantRavenousStrikes.NAME: [#bf3a3b]Ravenous [#bf3a3b]Strikes
theGodHunters:RevenantRavenousStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Deal !D! damage and heal for half the unblocked damage dealt. NL not_implemented - Gain !M! Vicious stack(s).

theGodHunters:RevenantCard5.NAME: [#bf3a3b]Bloodbath
theGodHunters:RevenantCard5.DESCRIPTION: Attack a random enemy for !D! damage. Repeat for every Berserk stack (max 10). Lose all Berserk stacks.
theGodHunters:RevenantCard5.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Attack a random enemy for !D! damage. Repeat for every Berserk stack (max 15). Lose all Berserk stacks.

theGodHunters:BullyIntimidate.NAME: Intimidate
theGodHunters:BullyIntimidate.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Reduce enemy strength by !M!.

theGodHunters:BullyTaunt.NAME: Taunt
theGodHunters:BullyTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply 2 Vulnerable to an attacking enemy. NL Otherwise apply 2 weak and force the enemy to attack.
theGodHunters:BullyTaunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply 3 Weak to an attacking enemy. NL Otherwise apply 2 weak and force the enemy to attack.

theGodHunters:BullyWimp.NAME: Wimp
theGodHunters:BullyWimp.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

theGodHunters:BullyHostility.NAME: Hostility
theGodHunters:BullyHostility.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Placeholder - Gain !M! Strength every turn.
